inkball

类 Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • inkball.Line

  • public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
    The Line class represents a line made up of a series of points. It provides methods for adding points, drawing the line, detecting collisions with balls, reflecting balls off the line, and checking if a point is within the line's thickness.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.List<Vec> points 
      protected int thickness 

    • 构造器概要

      构造器和说明

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addPoint(float x, float y)
      Adds a new point to the line.
      boolean ballDistanceWithLine(Ball ball, Vec p1, Vec p2)
      Checks if the distance between a ball and a line segment is less than the ball's radius.
      boolean containsPoint(float mouseX, float mouseY)
      Checks if a given point (e.g., mouse position) is within the line's thickness.
      void draw(App app)
      Draws the line on the application canvas.
      boolean isLineCollision(Ball ball)
      Checks for collisions between the ball and the line segments.
      void reflectBall(Ball ball, Vec p1, Vec p2)
      Reflects a ball off a line segment based on its current position and velocity.

    • 方法详细资料

      • addPoint

        public void addPoint(float x,
                     float y)
        Adds a new point to the line.
        参数:
        x - The x-coordinate of the point to add.
        y - The y-coordinate of the point to add.

      • draw

        public void draw(App app)
        Draws the line on the application canvas.
        参数:
        app - The application to draw to.

      • ballDistanceWithLine

        public boolean ballDistanceWithLine(Ball ball,
                                    Vec p1,
                                    Vec p2)
        Checks if the distance between a ball and a line segment is less than the ball's radius.
        参数:
        ball - The ball to check for collision with the line.
        p1 - The first point of the line segment.
        p2 - The second point of the line segment.
        返回:
        True if the ball is close enough to the line segment; false otherwise.

      • isLineCollision

        public boolean isLineCollision(Ball ball)
        Checks for collisions between the ball and the line segments.
        参数:
        ball - The ball to check for collisions.
        返回:
        True if a collision is detected; false otherwise.

      • reflectBall

        public void reflectBall(Ball ball,
                        Vec p1,
                        Vec p2)
        Reflects a ball off a line segment based on its current position and velocity.
        参数:
        ball - The ball to reflect.
        p1 - The first point of the line segment.
        p2 - The second point of the line segment.

      • containsPoint

        public boolean containsPoint(float mouseX,
                             float mouseY)
        Checks if a given point (e.g., mouse position) is within the line's thickness.
        参数:
        mouseX - The x-coordinate of the point to check.
        mouseY - The y-coordinate of the point to check.
        返回:
        True if the point is within the line's thickness; false otherwise.
